description: Endometrioid adenocarcinoma of the endometrium with invasion of less than 50% of the myometrium, cervical stromal involvement, and ovarian involvement with negative lymph nodes.
patient_notes: Your surgery showed endometrial cancer that invaded the uterine muscle less than halfway, spread to the cervix and an ovary, but did not involve the lymph nodes. This is classified as stage IIIA. The recommended treatment includes chemotherapy and may include focused radiation to the pelvis or vaginal area. We will guide you through each step and provide support throughout your treatment.

verification.assessment: The extracted staging as FIGO IIIA (pT3aN0M0) based on cervical stromal and adnexal involvement is accurate, and the treatment recommendation aligns with NCCN guidelines for stage III endometrioid adenocarcinoma.
